price: Nisu se nevjernici između sljedbenika Knjige i mnogobošci odvojili, sve dok im nije došao dokaz jasni;
arabic: لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lam yakuni alladhīna kafarū min ahli al-kitābi wal-mush'rikīna munfakkīna ḥattā tatiyahumu al-bayinatu
